name: bracket
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: either of two symbols put around a word, phrase, or sentence in a piece of writing to show that what is between them should be considered as separate from the main part

example.eg: Biographical information is included in brackets.
example.egtrans: 括号里给出了作者的个人信息。

example.eg: You should include the date of publication in round brackets after the title.
example.egtrans: 你应该在题目后面的圆括号里注明出版日期。

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a group with fixed upper and lower limits

example.eg: They were both surgeons in a high income bracket.
example.egtrans: 他俩都属于高收入阶层的外科医生。

example.eg: Most of our students are in the 18–22 age bracket.
example.egtrans: 我们大多数的学生都属于18至22岁这个年龄段。

example.eg: Her pay rise brought her into a new tax bracket.
example.egtrans: 她薪水的增加使她进入了新的纳税等级。

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of metal, wood, or plastic, usually L-shaped, that is fastened to a wall and used to support something such as a shelf
trans_examp.trans_cn: （通常呈L形、固定在墙上的）托架，支架，小壁架

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a diagram (= drawing) showing a series of games played in a tournament (= sports competition)

example.eg: In some tournaments, the full bracket is determined before the first game.
example.egtrans: 有些锦标赛的总赛程表在第一场比赛前就已经确定好了。

name: bracket
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put brackets around words, phrases, numbers, etc.

example.eg: I've bracketed the parts of the text that could be omitted.
example.egtrans: 我已把文章可省略的部分用括号括起来了。

dsense.name: bracket
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you bracket two or more things or people, you consider them to be similar or connected to each other.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…相提并论；把…归入同一类

example.eg: He's often bracketed with the romantic poets of this period although this does not reflect the range of his work.
example.egtrans: 人们常常把他与这个时期的浪漫诗人相提并论，尽管这并不能反映出他的作品的涉猎范围。
